item.title: 「Quad-Shorter with 75% ETH Win Rate」 Adds to ETH Short Position, Current Position Size Reaches $127 Million
item.description: On August 5th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD, the "Four Battles ETH 75% Win Rate Whale" augmented its short position in ETH to 35,000 coins (with a nominal value of approximately $127 million). The opening price was $3,641.5 and the liquidation price was $3,805.In this round, the short position of this whale on ETH has shifted from a floating profit of $12.25 million to a floating loss of $170,000.

item.title: Payment service company Remitly will adopt a stablecoin for cross-border payments
item.description: On August 5th, the payment service company Remitly is going to adopt stablecoin technology in order to enhance its international remittance capabilities. This action is intended to position Remitly at the forefront of financial technology innovation. By using blockchain technology, it will be able to provide customers in more than 170 countries with faster, more cost-effective, and secure cross-border payment solutions.

item.title: Thomas Lee: ETH Will Still Be One of the Biggest Macro Trends in the Next 10 to 15 Years
item.description: On August 5th, Thomas Lee, the chairman of the board of BitMine, tweeted, saying, "BMNR currently possesses 833,133 ETH, which is worth 3 billion US dollars. This makes it the largest ETH treasury in the world and the third-largest cryptocurrency treasury in the world."As Wall Street financializes blockchain and artificial intelligence leads to the tokenization of robotic assets, ETH will continue to be one of the biggest macro trends in the next 10 to 15 years.

item.title: Shitcoins Surge Across the Board, ILV Surges Over 75% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 5th, according to HTX market data, altcoins witnessed a general rise. The specific details are as follows:ILV is currently trading at $22.27, with a 24-hour increase of more than 75%;MAGIC is currently priced at $0.265, experiencing a 24-hour increase of over 48%;RARE is currently valued at $0.0648, showing a 24-hour increase of more than 29%;KERNEL is currently priced at $0.2425, with a 24-hour increase of over 25%;SYN is currently priced at $0.1504, having a 24-hour increase of over 21%;PARTI is currently priced at $0.2068, with a 24-hour increase of over 19%.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $3.235 billion, while the Ethereum ETF experienced a net outflow of $4.651 billion.
item.description: On August 5th, according to Farside data, the net outflow of the US Spot Bitcoin ETF was $323.5 million yesterday. Additionally, the net outflow of the Ethereum ETF was $465.1 million, with the net outflow of the Ethereum ETF reaching a record high.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $226 million in liquidations across the network, with ETH surpassing BTC in the amount liquidated.
item.description: On August 5th, based on Coinglass data, the entire network witnessed a liquidation of $226 million within the past 24 hours. Among this amount, the liquidation of long positions was $89.58 million, and that of short positions was $136 million. The amount of ETH liquidated exceeded that of BTC, reaching $85.9 million.

item.title: Bloomberg Analyst: Bitcoin's Volatility Has Significantly Decreased Since the Launch of a Bitcoin Spot ETF, Now Less Than Twice That of Gold
item.description: On August 5th, Bloomberg ETF Senior Analyst Eric Balchunas posted on social media, saying, "Since the listing of the Bitcoin ETF, its volatility has decreased significantly. The 90-day rolling volatility has dropped below 40 for the first time, while it was above 60 at the time of the ETF listing. For comparison, when combined with GLD data, Bitcoin's volatility is now less than twice that of gold, whereas it used to be more than three times."

item.title: Grok Imagine has launched the Grok iOS application
item.description: On August 5th, Musk tweeted that the Grok Imagine has launched the iOS Grok app and will soon launch the Grok Android app.The new features of Grok Imagine include: text-to-video generation (users can quickly create sound-enabled short videos through text prompts, with a maximum length of 6 seconds), image-to-video conversion (can transform static images into dynamic videos, supporting animated artwork, sculptures, or other pictures), etc.

item.title: The amount of ETH queued for exiting the Ethereum PoS network has decreased for 3 consecutive days, with the current value being approximately 17.85 billion USD worth of ETH in the exit queue.
item.description: On August 5th, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, the current exit queue on the Ethereum PoS network is temporarily reported to be 488,686 ETH, which is approximately worth $17.85 billion. The amount of queued ETH has been continuously decreasing for 3 days, and the waiting time for exit is approximately 8 days and 12 hours.At the same time, the amount of ETH queued to join the network is approximately 125,718 ETH, worth approximately $4.59 billion, with an expected activation delay of about 2 days and 4 hours.Earlier reports have shown that this situation reflects two opposing forces in the market. On the one hand, some stakers may have decided to cash out after Ethereum rebounded by more than 160% from its April low, resulting in a surge in the exit queue. On the other hand, new inflows of funds, mainly driven by regulatory tailwinds and institutional demand, are also boosting the entry queue. This is evident in publicly traded companies s

item.title: Linea: Native Yield Farming will be launched in the coming months, bridging ETH for automatic staking on the mainnet
item.description: On August 5th, Linea made an announcement. In the forthcoming months, it is going to launch native staking and bridge Linea's ETH to Lido v3 for automatic staking on the Ethereum mainnet. The staking rewards that are generated will flow back into the Linea ecosystem and be distributed to liquidity providers. This will support liquidity programs and amplify rewards.
